item.title: a super awesome BM machinima
item.dc:creator: Parnifia
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

A friend linked me to the video, I looked around the forum for it (didn’t see it) and searched for the URL to see if it had been linked before (no results), so I made a duplicate thread…
I guess it has something to do with the shortening of links; the search excludes things in the [FONT=‘Courier New’][url[/FONT]=] tag, and can’t match “?v=rSV8yDDznGc” with “?v=rSV8y…layer_embedded”.

Hmmm… When I get back to my desktop, I may have to try reproducing this scene in Black Mesa :awesome:

I see, I see. That is alright, then. Do not ask me why I am talking like this all of a sudden, because it’s probably just because I’m crazy.

Read full topic

I guess it has something to do with the shortening of links; the search excludes things in the [FONT=‘Courier New’][url[/FONT]=] tag, and can’t match “?v=rSV8yDDznGc” with “?v=rSV8y…layer_embedded”.

item.title: a super awesome BM machinima
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
I heard you Black Mesa guys tweeted it and facebooked it, but I think it deserves a plug on the forums too. I wouldn’t have heard of it if it weren’t for a studious comrade bringing it to my attention.[indent]A Free Man - A Black Mesa Machinima (alternate Ending) [No SFM][/indent]

What a remarkable little film it is. I’ve gotta give him credit for making something so colorful and immersive without resorting to SFM. That’s true machinima.

[align=right][color=’#A0A0A0’]Also, another link as an honorable mention: ENTER THE FREEMAN: Half-Life Film[/size][/align]

[COLOR=‘Red’]Merged this thread with the existing one.

Read full topic

item.title: a super awesome BM machinima
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Well Half-Life has more action in mind than saddened emotions, mostly. These videos are supposed to pull away from the game and give views on how some of the characters feel during them. This one in particular being Gordon feels bad, and like he caused all of these deaths and torment.

Read full topic

item.title: a super awesome BM machinima
item.dc:creator: jessiestorm88
item.description:
Eh it’s good, but a little slow for my tastes. I don’t get all these artsy short films that make half-life look super sad. It never seemed like a sad game to me. If anything it’s more of a tragic comedy.

Read full topic

item.title: a super awesome BM machinima
item.dc:creator: Paz_Ortega_Andrade
item.description:
That was… so sad…

It’s strange… I was really upset while playing the Unforeseen Consequences, but seeing it like this, with this music and… I nearly cried :’(

Well… Eso es genial…

item.title: a super awesome BM machinima
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
I saw it when they posted it on their Facebook page. Probably the best Half-Life fan film I’ve seen, and what’s more he didn’t do any animating - it’s all in-game footage!
